flavor_text_entries.black:
It loves sweets because they become
energy for the fire burning inside
its body.
flavor_text_entries.white:
A flame burns inside its body.
It scatters embers from its head
and tail to sear its opponents.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
When it gets excited, embers rise
from its head and tail and it gets hot.
For some reason, it loves sweets.

For some reason, it loves sweets.
